title: Image quality of abdominal photon-counting CT with reduced contrast media dose: Evaluation of reduced contrast media protocols during the COVID19 pandemic supply shortage
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Yannik C. Layer, Alexander Isaak, Narine Mesropyan, Patrick A. Kupczyk, Julian A. Luetkens, Tatjana Dell, Ulrike I. Attenberger, Daniel Kuetting
